alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 2:06PM PST until December 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT PST /1 AM MST/ TONIGHT TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Lake Mead National Recreation Area, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave, Eastern Mojave Desert, Cadiz Basin, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley, and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...From midnight PST /1 AM MST/ tonight to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Choppy waters and large waves will occur on area lakes. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Unsecured objects will be blown around.
info.instruction: Use extra caution if driving high profile vehicles or motorcycles. Boaters should avoid the open waters or postpone outings until winds subside. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Southern Clark County
